name: Deer Stranger
description:
A game about saving a city while remaining anonymous, you don't know your origins or what are you .. but you know what you're here for.

You play As a deer man with a magical sword that can slash the "Grubbs" into pieces.

Use AWSD to move around and the SPACE key to cast a normal attack, of course the ESCAPE key is for pausing the game.

Try to beat the game as fast as you can and post you time record in the comments :p
